content.title: Lymphangiography
content.description: Imaging techniques to visualize lymphatic system

key_concepts.details: Direct cannulation of lymphatic vessel with oil-based contrast; largely historic
Intradermal injection of technetium-labeled colloid; tracks drainage to lymph nodes
Gadolinium-based contrast injected intradermally; provides anatomic detail
Near-infrared fluorescence imaging with indocyanine green; real-time visualization

content.clinical_significance: Lymphoscintigraphy remains standard for lymphedema diagnosis
